pr_title: Use public oncokb instance for portal without token

timeline.bodyText: @jjgao I still remained the message. But let me know if you think it's no longer needed.
timeline.author: zhx828

timeline.bodyText: @zhx828 do you think we need to set a default url for this one?
timeline.author: leexgh

replies.bodyText: @leexgh I don't think so. We use its empty status for later printing out the warning message.
replies.author: zhx828

timeline.message:
Give warning when the instance is connecting to a public oncokb instance

Update documentation for using oncokb token to access therapeutic info

Update all oncokb url to https

Co-authored-by: Onur Sumer <s.onur.sumer@gmail.com>

Signed-off-by: Hongxin Zhang <hongxin@cbio.mskcc.org>
